title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
description: Developed a real-time fraud detection system using FastAPI, Kafka, and Cassandra, enabling efficient transaction monitoring and fraud analysis with scalable microservices architecture.

title: Healthcare Management Platform
description: Developed the TBIBI APP, a scalable web platform that enhances healthcare access and delivery for patients and professionals. Built key services including a real-time messaging system using WebSocket, a symptom-based doctor search, and an AI-powered app for doctors to review patient documents and find possible diagnoses.

title: Medical Image Captioning
description: Development of a chest X-ray images analysis tool using Vision Transformer and GPT-2. Improved ROUGE and CIDEr scores by 5% compared to ResNet-GPT2 approach.

title: Url Phishing Detector
description: Developed a machine learning solution to detect phishing URLs, involving data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model training. The project includes a React frontend and a FastAPI backend, facilitating user interactions for training and inference. The application is containerized using Docker, ensuring efficient deployment and scalability if needed.
